transcript:
Executive: Haan sir, good morning. Haan good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning. Namaste Shubhkamna ji ko aap se hai. Aap haan haan boliye sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Abhi free hai aap?
Executive: Haan bilkul ekdum free hai aap.
Executive: Sir pehle to ek cheez main aapko bata du ki bhai kal aap aap se baat hui thi shayad hai na?
Customer: Haan baat hui thi train mein the kuch baat sun rahe the kuch nahi bhi.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi. Kal aap kal aap thode busy the aaj thoda time samay denge aap hume?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul samay de rahe hai aap 10-15 minute jo hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul. Kamlesh ji pehli cheez to ye jo meri kal aap se baat hui thi buyleads ke liye lekar ki business ke liye lekar ki aap keh bol rahe the ki buylead achi nahi aa rahi hai business nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Kuch isse related hamari baat hui thi is cheez mein aap se thoda sa aapko brief discussion karunga aap se is cheez ke bare mein.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Main aapko maine aapko pehle bhi bataya tha main kabhi aise nahi bolunga ki ek businessman ka ek seedha sa funda hota hai hamesha koi pata hai ki aapko sirf apna growth ke company growth se personal growth se matlab hota hai.
Executive: Ki be faltu ke chakkar mein nahi fasenge products ke buylead ke aur is chakkar mein.
Executive: To main aapko ek cheez bata deta hu.
Executive: Ki hamari company chal rahi hai Kamlesh ji.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Usme kya hai usme aapko maine last time bataya tha pehli cheez to ye jo thoda sa aapka jo farak padta hai iska inquiries ka aur calls ka calls to dekho aap receive kar hi rahe ho calls maine aapko kal bataya tha calls receive agar aap karoge to aapki calls ki aur jyada calls aapke pass aane shuru honge kyuki AI based computerised system hai Kamlesh ji jis hisab se aapki performance rahegi uske upar us hisab se cheeze deliver kare jayenge aapko. Pehle to aap sir meri ab ek cheez suniye.
Executive: Kamlesh ji.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ji sir main aapko ek cheez batana chah raha hu.
Executive: Boliye na.
Customer: Jo aap aap jo bol rahe the na beech mein ki main wo karunga apna number change karu number karwaunga do number ka ek number karunga.
Executive: Kyuki isme kya hota hai aapka jo aapka jo IndiaMART mein registered number hai.
Executive: Usme aapke IndiaMART ka registered number hai aap mahine ki 13 13 14 14 calls miss kar rahe hai iska kya matlab hai ki agle mahine se call aani aapke pass kam ho jayegi aur band ho jayegi tarike se.
Executive: Ye seedha seedha sa aap samjh matlab hai is cheez ka agar aap platform pe active rahoge barabar calls receive karoge calls uthaoge aur jo hai.
Customer: Call hold kare hai sir.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good buyleads.

- Customer wants to change his registered number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of receiving calls.

- Executive explained the impact of changing registered number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, registered number, calls
